name: 代數幾何導論（一）
description: 向同學介紹代數幾何的基本概念，同時希望能引起同學對這個領域的興趣。
goals: 習得代數幾何的基本知識
syllabus:
這門課主要目的是向同學介紹代數幾何的基本概念，同時希望能引起同學對這個領域的興趣。以下是希望在地這學期的課程裡能夠涵蓋的內容：

1\. Algebraic curves in the plane -- plane curves, relation with field theory, rational maps, the projective plane

2\. Closed subsets of affine space -- definition, regular functions on a closed subset, regular maps

3\. Rational functions -- irreducible algebraic subsets, rational functions and rational maps

4\. Quasiprojective varieties -- closed subsets of projective spaces, regular functions, rational functions

5\. Products and maps of quasiprojective varieties

6\. Dimension -- definition, dimension of intersection with a hypersurface, the theorem on the dimension of fibres, lines on surfaces.
